data.text: Ine ndidzakutamandani, Inu Yehova, ndi mtima wanga wonse;
Ndidzakondwa ndi kusangalala mwa inu;
Adani anga amathawa,
Pakuti Inu mwatsimikiza za kulungama kwanga ndi mlandu wanga;
Mwadzudzula mitundu ya anthu ndipo mwawononga anthu oyipa;
Chiwonongeko chosatha chagwera adani,
Yehova akulamulira kwamuyaya;
Iye adzaweruza dziko mwachilungamo;
Yehova ndiye kothawirako kwa opsinjika mtima,
Iwo amene amadziwa dzina lanu adzadalira Inu,
Imbani nyimbo zamatamando kwa Yehova, ali pa mpando waufumu mu Ziyoni;
Pakuti Iye amene amabwezera chilango akupha anzawo wakumbukira;
Inu Yehova, onani momwe adani anga akundizunzira!
kuti ndilengeze za matamando anu
Mitundu ya anthu yagwa m ºdzenje limene yakumba;
Yehova amadziwika ndi chilungamo chake;
Oyipa amabwerera ku manda,
Koma osowa sadzayiwalika nthawi zonse,
Dzukani Inu Yehova, musalole munthu kuti apambane;
Akantheni ndi mantha aakulu, Inu Yehova;
